summary:
Here's a short teaser trailer for my upcoming movie I'm making using skyrim. Please enjoy and leave a comment. I'd love to hear you guys think of it. Also you may watch this trailer and other stuff on my youtube channel.
<br /><br />
<br /><br /> https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmJB4zfHYHxe2zOG-5T8I
descriptionHtml:
Here's a short teaser trailer for my upcoming movie I'm making using skyrim. Please enjoy and leave a comment. I'd love to hear you guys think of it. Also you may watch this trailer and other stuff on my youtube channel. I've been working on this for a while and trying out a more cinematic feel to Skyrim, note this video is no lore friendly so please do not expect that. This version of the game is highly modded and feel free to ask me any questions about it. Also all credits to the mod makers to the mods I've used in this video. Thanks!

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmJB4zfHYHxe2zOG-5T8IXg
author: Shlexi55
